quote: They began their climb, already weary, and the sun tried to steal whatever strength they had left. It was another god, a forgotten god, who gave a daily reminder, and was forgotten again each night.
quote_letters: THEY BEGAN THEIR CLIMB ALREADY WEARY AND THE SUN TRIED TO STEAL WHATEVER STRENGTH THEY HAD LEFT IT WAS ANOTHER GOD A FORGOTTEN GOD WHO GAVE A DAILY REMINDER AND WAS FORGOTTEN AGAIN EACH NIGHT
